title: ‘If you Say Mark Cavendish Can’t, He Probably Will’: Witnessing History with Cavendish’s Inner Circle
content:
All the emotions, euphoria and reflections as Astana-Qazaqstan team-mates and Cavendish confidants react to a fairytale 35th stage win.

Read the full article at ‘If you Say Mark Cavendish Can’t, He Probably Will’: Witnessing History with Cavendish’s Inner Circle on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
